issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.

Avoid using `android.media.ExifInterface`; use `androidx.exifinterface.media.ExifInterface` instead
Avoid using `android.media.ExifInterface`; use `androidx.exifinterface.media.ExifInterface` instead
Attribute `tooltipText` is only used in API level 26 and higher (current min is 24)
Attribute `targetCellWidth` is only used in API level 31 and higher (current min is 24)
Attribute `targetCellHeight` is only used in API level 31 and higher (current min is 24)
Attribute `maxResizeWidth` is only used in API level 31 and higher (current min is 24)
Attribute `maxResizeHeight` is only used in API level 31 and higher (current min is 24)

This intent filter has the format of an Android App Link but is missing the `autoVerify` attribute; add `android:autoVerify="true"` to ensure your domain will be validated and enable App Link-related Lint warnings. If you do not want clicked URLs to bring the user to your app, remove the `android.intent.category.BROWSABLE` category, or set `android:autoVerify="false"` to make it clear this is not intended to be an Android App Link.
Use `enqueueUniquePeriodicWork()` instead of `enqueue()`
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)
Your app is currently not handling Selected Photos Access introduced in Android 14+
